content.prompt: Which of the following was a primary cause of the developments depicted on the map?

choices.label: Southern states encouraged former slaves to seek employment on the railroads in the West.
American Indians voluntarily relocated to centralized settlements to free space for transportation systems.
Federal subsidies encouraged the growth of infrastructure.
Labor unions lobbied for projects that expanded jobs in the railroad industry.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
